name: Zero Ground
description:
Little game that I made for ScoreSpace Jam #15

Test your skills in this game where every one, even player, can die of one bullet. Be carefull.

Points can be gained by kills, escaping from chasing enemies, taking quest items.  Also you have chance to revive yourself, if your bullet hit someone after your death. 

I tried to implement simple AI with stealth mechanics. But for this small game I couldnt make it good enogth.

Have fun and beat the highest score.

Controls:

WASD - movement

LMB - shoot

Space - dash
